title: Short-Intensive Course to Address Academic Achievement Gaps Through AP Mathematics Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational mathematics concepts at the 9th-grade middle school level
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment supporting all students' access to AP mathematics programs, combining self-directed learning with personal devices and teacher feedback

learning_goals: Learners can explain five core concepts of the AP Mathematics curriculum with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can apply step-by-step problem-solving strategies to three types of AP-style constructed-response questions.
Learners confirm foundational academic achievement by scoring an average of 70 or higher on weekly formative assessments.

resources: Calculator rental service for practical use

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
